## 读取lambda

```{julia}
f = "/mnt/z/GitHub/jl-spatial/Whittaker2.jl/scripts/Project_Global_LAI_smoothing/OUTPUT/global_param_lambda_cv_2018-2022.zarr" |> path_mnt
ds = open_dataset(f)

st_ds2tiff(ds; prefix = "lambda_cv_2018-2022",overwrite=false)
run(`./gee_upload.sh`)
# lims = ((b.xmin, b.xmax), (b.ymin, b.ymax))
```

## upload to gee

```{julia}
col_org = "projects/gee-hydro/MODIS_Terra_LAI/global_param_lambda_cv"
col_new = "projects/gee-hydro/MODIS_Terra_LAI/param_lambda_cv/lambda_cv_2018_2022"

run(`geeadd move --initial $col_org --final $col_new`)
```
